column4: this is the most un user friendly os ive ever jumped into lolz

lolz

so therefore all its want me to do is extract it
firefox
are you using 64bit?
why are you downloading rpms?
all the more reason you should be nstalling things the right way, as opposed to making it harder on yourself.
are you using 32bit or 64bit ubuntu
then it should install just like Windows... go to youtube, add missing plugins, install, then restart firefox.
opena  terminal (Applications/Accessories/terminal) and type this w/o quotes.. "uname -a"   and paste the output here
select adobe flash player, don't choose gnash.
stop linking us to that, i don't care.
are you going to follow instructions or not?
go to youtube.com and yous hould get a popup to install missing plug ins... click install.
then again, please listen... open a terminal.. (Applications/Accessories/Terminal), and type this w/o quotes. "uname -a" and paste the output here.. make sure there's a space before -
ok, you're using 32bit.
so now the question is, why can't you install flash, like 99% of other Linux users?
you don't seem like one...
